WorkItem.Description:
its being already discussion in the "discussion" but wanted to make sure its correctly logged as an issue here.
Â 
When updating the spell rotation list rawr hangs when the list gets saved. It seems to be somehow related to the "shadowbolt" as I can save the list without any issues as long as I leave shadowbolt in the spell priority list. the moment I remove it from the list the apps hangs when I try to save it.

Comments.Message: Well, glad people want to make sure we have issues properly logged, but... Really? You didn't notice the dozen other issues here already for this exact issue?
